Hello World

An attempt at working with Jekyll, Markdown, and Github Pages

Let's see how this thing works

How about a list?

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item

Or a numbered one?

  1. list 1
  2. list 2
  3. list 3

Welcome to Jekyll!

You'll find this post in your posts directory - edit this post and re-build (or run with the -w switch) to see your changes! To add new posts, simply add a file in the posts directory that follows the convention: YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll's GitHub repo.
